title: Shopify Store Manager
job_overview:
We’re looking for someone who treats our Shopify store like their own.

Hi! We’re GMD Studio — a creative studio working with DTC lifestyle brands on everything from branding and email to websites and product launches. We’re on the hunt for someone to help maintain and optimise a few of our Shopify stores.

This role is ideal for someone who’s organised, reliable, and deeply familiar with the backend of Shopify — but also thinks like a customer. We’re not just looking for someone to tick off tasks. We want someone who’s constantly auditing the site through a conversion lens — noticing where things feel unclear, clunky, or off-brand — and suggesting (or making) smart improvements.

Key Responsibilities:
– Uploading and formatting new products (images, copy, tags, SEO, collections)
– Building and updating landing pages (from a template)
– Spotting issues like broken links, outdated banners, missing size charts or inconsistent messaging
– Suggesting opportunities to improve copy, flow, or imagery to drive conversion
– Assisting with updates during sales, product launches, and seasonal changes

We’d love to work with someone who:
– Has strong Shopify experience across different themes
– Is proactive and self-directed — you don’t wait to be told what’s broken
– Thinks like a customer and sweats the small stuff - has a great eye for detail and aesthetics (bonus if you’ve worked with lifestyle/fashion brands)
– Communicates clearly and reliably (we work async across time zones)

Nice-to-haves:
– Experience using Canva or Figma
– Comfort writing or editing product descriptions
